parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query. Supported properties are id,type,state,givenName,familyName,billReceiver.givenName,billReceiver.familyName,externalId,tradingName,phoneNumber,mobileNumber,emailAddress,businessNumber,lastStatusChange. The property parameters containing arbitrary key/value pairs can be searched.

parameters.name: scroll
parameters.description: If set to true, requests a result containing a `scrollId` to continue scrolling through the result.

parameters.name: scrollId
parameters.description: The requested scroll id to continue scrolling through the result. Ignored if not provided.
